channel.title: World map button teleport. Need help
channel.description:
I am using a pi source how do I get the world map to tele players i found the code that sends the message to players but when I got to add a tele command it keeps getting errors.
Thank you if anyone can help me solve this I'm new to coding.

item.title: World map button teleport. Need help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Ideuzee, post:8, topic:530074”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=648829.msg4362777#msg4362777 date=1379086736]
Well, first off, that looks like client sided code. So you’re actually going to want to remove that, then server sided add the clicking button case in where it be appropriate (Ex: ClickingButtons.java for PI) and have it execute a teleport.

To get the clicking button ID make sure you have some form of debugging code in your class that handles button clicking (See if you gave us more information I’d be more of a help.) that prints out the id to you or the server console.
[/quote]

Thanks now I understand where I am going wrong exactly what you said yes it’s client sided il try do what you said if I have any problems I will relate back to this thank you![/quote]
Of course. Just post errors and code (if any) if you’re having issues.

Read full topic
item.source: World map button teleport. Need help

item.title: World map button teleport. Need help

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:530074”]Well, first off, that looks like client sided code. So you’re actually going to want to remove that, then server sided add the clicking button case in where it be appropriate (Ex: ClickingButtons.java for PI) and have it execute a teleport.

To get the clicking button ID make sure you have some form of debugging code in your class that handles button clicking (See if you gave us more information I’d be more of a help.) that prints out the id to you or the server console.[/quote]

Thanks now I understand where I am going wrong exactly what you said yes it’s client sided il try do what you said if I have any problems I will relate back to this thank you!

item.title: World map button teleport. Need help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well, first off, that looks like client sided code. So you’re actually going to want to remove that, then server sided add the clicking button case in where it be appropriate (Ex: ClickingButtons.java for PI) and have it execute a teleport.

To get the clicking button ID make sure you have some form of debugging code in your class that handles button clicking (See if you gave us more information I’d be more of a help.) that prints out the id to you or the server console.

Read full topic

	}
	if(l == 1050) {//world map
		pushMessage("<col=225>Vote and Then Claim Your Rewards! with ::claim", 0, "");
	}

so when i click on the world map sprite it will tele me?
